text: Ara tini balechilena -- ''tomara to allah‌ke chere diye pratima-guloke grahana kare, tomadera madhye bandhutba e'i duniyara jibane'i, tarapara kiyamatera dine tomadera ekapaksa apara paksake asbikara karabe ebam tomadera eke aparake abhisapa debe, ara tomadera abasa habe aguna, ara tomadera jan'ya sahayyakaridera ke'u thakabe na.’’
